sections.heading: THE TUTORSHIP BY THE EFFECT OF THE LAWArt
sections.text: 263. Qualified ascendants; collaterals by blood; surviving spouse.When a tutor has not been appointed to the minor by father or mother dying last, or if the tutor thus appointed has not been confirmed or has been excused, then the judge shall appoint to the

sections.heading: Qualified ascendants; collaterals by blood; surviving spouse.
